title: What can I do if the positioning and navigation information displayed on my phone is inaccurate?
answer:
l   The positioning accuracy depends on the GPS satellites and map accuracy. Bring your phone to an outdoor location with good reception. The GPS signals are weak indoors, which may cause inaccurate positioning results.

l   Turn on Wi-Fi for better positioning accuracy. Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **Location access**, and select the **Access my location** check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208150009142001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208150009807002.jpg)  

You can also try another map application.

If the problem persists, contact Huawei technical support or take your phone to an authorized Huawei service center.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141208150010844003.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
